1: <pb/><t>¡Ajwalinjtzxwit Qman Dyos! <pb/>¡Kyajwali'nktze' Qman Dyos toju' tja xjan!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' aye'ye' ate'ye' twitzju' kya'j tb'anilxi'x!</t>
2: <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' kyu'nju' tb'inchb'en nimaq kyoklen!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' tu'nju' nimxi'x toklen mixti' b'ajsb'il te!</t>
3: <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' kyuk'i'l chun!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' tuk'i'l chnab' arpa ex tzintzin!</t>
4: <t>¡Che b'ixinqe'ye' ajwalb'ilte tuk'i'l chilchil!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' kyuk'i'l xux ex kyuk'i'l chnab' tzintzin!</t>
5: <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' kyuk'i'l txijtxij k'ok'e' nche txijun!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' kyuk'i'l txijtxij nimaq nche k'onin!</t>
6: <t>¡Kykyaqile' ati kychwinqlale', kyajwali'nktze' Qman Dyos! <pb/>¡Ajwalinjtzxwit Qman Dyos! chiju' b'itzal.</t>
